entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Peters Bay

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 8:00 PM ADT Friday 17 March 2023
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -1.7°C
Wind: NNW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with periods of light snow beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 8:33 PM ADT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with rain in the morning and ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:33 PM ADT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 8:33 PM ADT Friday 17 March 2023
